name: retractable

that can be pulled back or in: Cats have retractable claws. The house has a swimming pool with a retractable roof. See

More examplesFewer examplesa retractable needle/syringeThe pool is equipped with a fully retractable safety cover.Many major new stadiums around the world have retractable seating so they can accommodate athletics.
